Title: Relates to conversions of real property in public housing developments in relation to the RAD program
Summary: Relates to conversions of real property in public housing developments in relation to the RAD program; sets notice requirements for public housing authorities.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to the conversion and transfer of real property in public housing developments
